name: spip
description:
Spip is a simple shooter game based from Soundodger+ and Asteroids(yeah, the old game)

Try beating the waves of enemies, dodging the closer enemies, with a "modern" style, give your best, what's the highest score you can get?

Game jam info:

Engine: Unity

Plugins: DOTween (free version)

Graphics: me

The meaning of the name: SPace shIP destroyer
